thread.title: Stage and Crowd Reactions to Oscar Best Picture Mistake | Variety
thread.title_full: Stage and Crowd Reactions to Oscar Best Picture Mistake | Variety

author: Jacob Bryant
title: Stage and Crowd Reactions to Oscar Best Picture Mistake | Variety
text:
Damien Chazelle and Trevante Rhodes Jordan Horowitz and Mahershala Ali Joi McMillon and Janelle Monae Mahershala Ali and Emma Stone Brian Cullinan and Warren Beatty Jordan Horowitz 
The cast and creators of “Moonlight” jump to their feets when they learn they’ve won best picture. 
“Moonlight” director Barry Jenkins reacts to learning his film actually won best picture. 
“La La Land” star Ryan Gosling tries to hide his reaction onstage after learning of the mistake. 
The Oscar crowd — including nominees like Casey Affleck, Michelle Williams, and Mel Gibson — were shocked by the mistake. 
“La La Land” director Damien Chazelle hugs “Moonlight” star Trevante Rhodes onstage. 
After announcing the true best picture winner, “La La Land” producer Jordan Horowitz hugs “Moonlight” star Mahershala Ali. 
“Moonlight” editor Joi McMillon and star Janelle Monae walk backstage in shock. 
“Moonlight” star and best supporting actor winner Mahershala Ali and “La La Land” star and best actress winner Emma Stone talk onstage after the announcement. 
Brian Cullinan and Warren Beatty discuss the mistake onstage. 
A look from backstage at the moment Jordan Horowitz’ shockingly announced that “Moonlight” actually won best picture. Image: AP
